vote.title: To authorize the Director of the Department of Public Service to enter into a contract with Nexstar Media Inc., for marketing campaign services for the Cleaner Columbus Initiative; to authorize an appropriation and expenditure within the Neighborhood Initiatives subfund; to waive the competitive bidding requirements of Columbus City Code; and to declare an emergency. ($100,000.00)
vote.description: A motion was made by Emmanuel V. Remy, seconded by Mitchell Brown, that this Ordinance be Approved. The motion carried by the following vote:
